case.state: Ahh yes, a game of Strip Duel Monsters with my Duel Academy frie... I mean idiot classmates that could never hope to beat me.
You will be playing against a card game expert, one of the best Duel Monsters players in the world.
You want to duel with the Chazz, huh? Ready to take a beating?
This place has a maid too? Hey waitress, an order of fried shrimp and a root beer, please?
Did you just say orgy? Because I think I just heard about an orgy?
You needed a magic artifact to come here? All I needed to do was drive here. Sure my car cost a million dollars, but I don't see why you'd need magic to beat it.
What have you you've got against angels? They're pretty harmless all things considered. Nothing combared to me Dragons, Machines, and beasts.
Okay, who's the person that finds classical literature sexy?
I don't think of a bunch of hundred year old books as sexy, but whatever.
I hope these cards are waterproof. Would be a shame if they got wet.
All this steam makes me Duel Monster cards unhappy. I'll be sure to sue this place if they get damaged.
Back at Duel Academy? I thought I'd never have to go back here again.
I mean, I want to sleep with Alexis, but I wouldn't want to do it in a classroom...
You think the beach impresses me? My family owns a beach. Several in fact.
Sex with Alexis on a nude beach... so romantic.
I don't drink, but hopefully the rest of you don't get wasted.
I'll be sure to buy Alexis a drink or eight. Hopefully this bar has what she likes.
Hey, what the? I WAS PROMISED STRIP DUEL MONSTERS! YOU HEAR ME?
Where is everybody? Who are these losers? Where is my beloved Alexis?
I use Pot of Greed. It lets me draw two cards.
It's the most overused Duel Monsters spell card there is, Pot of Greed. I draw two cards.
Blah Blah Blah I activate Pot of Greed Blah Blah Blah.
I activate Pot of Greed, the one and only. Nothing like its two dozen worse counterparts.
HELP ME, I'M BEING HELD AGAINST MY WILL! I'VE BEEN TAKEN BY THE RULE 34 ARMY
Slifer was originally known as Osiris the Sky Dragon. I'm curious as to why it was changed too. But there's a producer on my show named Slifer. Hmm...
Did you know that there's almost 10,000 Duel Monsters cards? And I say this knowing it will be outdated in 6 months when we pass that mark...
Did you know that Yami Yugi was originally a violent psychopath? He straight up murdered people!
If you dislike me, or think my fourth wall breaking is obnoxious, then be sure to scream incoherently into the feedback box that appears after I whoop you!
If you hate 4Kids, then take solace in the fact that they were sued and utterly destroyed. By me. Officially, it was over ZEXAL, but it was actually me!
Finger guns are considered a high-class weapon in my world. Why else would Pegasus trust his goons with them?
The Chazz demands ~cards~ cards.
I'll draw ~cards~ cards.
This hand is too puny, I'll draw ~cards~ cards.
I'll beat you once I draw ~cards~ cards.
(This is a good place to hide some weird facts, because it scrolls by so fast that nobody can read it.)
(I can hide strange facts in here, because the text scrolls by so fast that nobody can read it.)
(I have all the juicy info on Duel Monsters, and I'll shove it all here, in the card swapping lines, where nobody has the time to read it!)
So embarrassed soembarrassedd sembarrasseded!
I don't care what I'm discarding, I want to lose right now.
Give me bad cards or give me death! Wait no, I'm too young to die!
I'd discard 100 cards if it made me more likely to lose.
Take them all, I don't care!
Bada-bing, bada-boom. Simple as that.
Don't take this too personally, I'm just better than you
And this is why they call me The Chazz.
I'm gonna OTK you all with this hand.
A shame I can't take off all your clothing with one blow.
My card effect activates! It means I automatically win the round!
I should be playing the lottery, not playing strip poker with you dorks!
I hope you are ready to get Chazzed.
The one time I want to lose and I get a hand like this?
I CURSE OJAMA YELLOW!
So this is where all my luck has been?
Thanks Ojama Yellow, totally fantastic, totally don't wanna chuck you in an incinerator right now.
Some people think that your choice of cards says things about your personality, I think itâ€™s just fun blowing things up with my XYZ Dragon Cannon.
Whatever.
I am unstoppable!
Against slackers like you, I could win with anything!
There are zero hands that can defeat me!
Mediocrity shouldn't be what I strive for, but for now it will have to do.
Fine, if I can make a deck out of weak monsters and win, I can also win with this mediocre hand.
The Chazz can make any hand work, including this one.
Meh.
You think you can bring the Chazz down with these mediocre cards? Think again!
These cards are way lamer than my Armed Dragon LV7! They can't even generate holograms.
Please be the worst hand, please be the worst hand...
I don't just gotta do this without Alexis, I gotta do it with a bunch of guys as well?!
Hey, where's all the girls? I gotta play Strip Poker, and I don't even get to look at any boobies?
I've already seen Bastion's penis, I don't need to see any more.
Hey, what's the big idea?
Jaden would never get a hand this bad. That's what you get when you have main character powers.
Of course, of course I get the trash hands.
I guess the plot of this episode is "Chazz gets completely humiliated. Again."
Hey writers, Can I not be the butt of a joke, just this once?
How am I supposed to Chazz people up with cards like these?
Of course...
I may have made a terrible mistake.
Aaaand there goes my chance this turn...
Can we skip the battle phase this turn?
I... uh... activate... uh... swords of non revealing light, which means that I won't have to strip even if I lose this round... Right?
Good, now let's get these off already...
I'm only losing because I want to. Don't think you've beat the Chazz just yet.
A witch, huh? Let me guess, it's all smoke machines and holograms.
Magic isn't real, Lotte! Except for Duel Monster spirits. And the Sacred Beasts. And the Light of Destruction. Those are the only exceptions.
Explosion magic? I didn't even know such a school of magic existed... Probably a fake, just like that guy who claims dynamite is a martial art!
Allright, Megumin, where's the dynamite?
Whaddaya mean you think it's cute? You think that revolting mutant slug is cute?
You're not supposed to think it's cute, you're supposed to think it's ugly, just like I do.
So your name really is Panty? I don't gotta make fun of you, you make fun of yourself with a name like that!
That last line was a legit question. Someone here smells like death, and I'm looking at you, Number One.
That last part wasn't a lyric. This place stinks worse than than Syrus' bedsheets, and he wet the bed every other night! Do you wet the bed, Number One?
WHY AM I ANGRIER ABOUT THAT THAN I AM ABOUT MY LIFE BEING IN DANGER?
Another duel spirit? Powered by a trashy normal Tentacle Plant card? Ojamas are the only good normal monster!
My Obelisk Blue posse usually comes with a live band. If not, no biggie.
A Walkman? What kind of troglodyte still carries one of those around? MP3 players are the way of the future.
I remind you of your home? I don't wanna look like a dumb wizard, I wanna look like a cool and awesome duelist!
(Sorry Boss, they all canceled for vague reasons that probably sound like lies.)
No matter. If I can't see Alexis in the nude, then I'll just strip you with the force of a Duel Monsters Champion!
I didn't even know they made card games other than Duel Monsters... No matter! I'll still win anyways.
Wondering why my Duel Disk is blue? I got this in the hidden 4th season that never aired in America.
I got this swanky blue disk in the unaired 4th season, available now on Crunchyroll.
You thought my Duel Disk was supposed to be silver, right? Clearly you've never watched the fourth season that you couldn't watch because it never aired in America.
Do I need to bribe you to lose? Cause I've got the money for that!
What's a guy gotta do to lose their underwear around here?
When I try to win, I fail miserably. When I try to lose, I win without fail. The story of my life, ladies and gentlemen.
This game is rigged, I just know it!
Did your shadow magic also give me impossibly good luck, ~player~?
Surely you're all excited to see it considering the obnoxiously long wait. That's your cue to make me lose, dealer.
Joker? Don't call me a clown, you crazy redhead.
I am The Chazz, and will be reffered to as such. Ace is an okay name at least.
You can't keep me here! You've already seen me at my most embarrassed. All thanks to this stupid underwear!
I'm leaving! I can't handle you gawking at my underwear.
There's nothing left for me! I'm out of here. Have fun, losers.
You think this means anything? I won't even show my beautiful chest while you're butt naked!
That the best you can do? I've seen Slifer Reds who can pose a better threat that you.
The winner is reduced to the status of the loser. How quaint.
Stupid me, I was too busy mocking you to build a good defense.
About goddamn time!
Curse my luck, keeping my underwear for this long.
Finally...
I don't mind, you slackers will never beat me anyway.
You can't beat me, because I've got a billion dollars to my name.
You don't get to see the good stuff just yet. Hopefully, not ever.
Ojama Yellow, if you strip alongside me, your card is going straight in the paper shredder when I get home.
Yay, I wanted this underwear gone yesterday. (But the only way to buy it was in bulk. You've still got 50 pairs to destroy.)
We're just gonna pretend that this underwear never existed, right girls?
I lose again? Why can't the shonen anime rival ever get a break?
Twice in a row? Who don't you pick on someone poorer for a change?
Why can't the spoiled rich kid ever catch a break?
Why can't the spoiled rich kid ever catch a break?
I hate when dorks like you upstage me.
I guess this is what winning the Genex tournament gets you...
Yay, I wanted this underwear gone yesterday. (But the only way to buy it was in bulk. You've still got 50 pairs to destroy.)
We're just gonna pretend that this underwear never existed. Sound good?
For the record, I only lost on purpose. Don't get too confident.
I don't own a Duel Runner. People who duel on those are just asking for their face to be turned into ground beef when they crash!
If you want an expert Duel Monsters player, then I'm your man, Futaba. A world champion.
Ojama Yellow is not my Persona, I don't even know what that is. Metaverse is a pretty decent trap, though.
I'm not scared, you wanna know why?
You'll never see me naked, and there's a good reason for that.
Guess it'll be my shoes next. Not very expensive, but I don't want to get any cum stains on them.
I could buy designer boots with the Princeton family fortune, but I choose not to, because I don't want them getting dirty.
This makes me feel dirty, but I'm gonna strip off my Duel Disk.
Guess I'm gonna strip off my duel disk, and play at this table like an uncivilized barbarian.
Only Neanderthals play card games at a table. Guess I'm gonna get my ape on.
I'm part of one of the richest families on earth. The Princetons have a stake in basically everything, and also plans for world domination.
You're doing surprisingly well, ~player~. For a Slifer Slacker that is. You're not getting my undies.
Go easy on the fog mach- Hey, what the!
Would it kill you to turn off the fog mach...
Whoa, guess the rules against leaving are very strictly enforced...
You know what? I'm kinda glad I get to take this off!
Remind me to never wear Ojama themed underwear to this place again!
Well they didn't offer us a Battle Box, now did they? Duelists are always supposed to stand up tall and proud!
I can afford it. My family's got their own beauty expert under their employ. Specializes in peticures, haircuts, and plastic surgery, though that last one doesn't get much use.
I know, right? That's what I came here for, but they pulled a switcheroo on us. How despicable. Seems to me like their hearts need to be stolen.
Going commando would have been better than this. I don't even know why I bought this stupid underwear.
Because I've got the 4Kids censors on my side. They'll invent some kind of excuse to break this game up before I have to get naked.
The network censors will cut away before we even make it that far. No big deal.
Seems like a card dropped loose. It's Ojama Yellow, my "strongest" monster. I say it in air quotes to make him feel better, and he's too stupid to notice.
Nobody take that card that dropped. It's Ojama Yellow, my ace monster... when my XYZ and Armed Dragon cards are unusable for whatever reason.
Must have dropped this earlier. Don't insult me for using Ojama Yellow. Only I am allowed to insult Ojama Yellow.
Take a picture, it'll last longer!
You like it, ~player~? I ought to slap you, but that wouldn't be very sexy, now would it?
Wait, why aren't 4Kids censoring my penis? This was not supposed to happen!
Lousy network censors must be asleep at the wheel. At least I get to see everyone else in the nude...
Eew, this floor is filthy. Dripping with the cum of beautiful girls. And also tons of germs.
Eew, I think I've stepped in something. Would it kill them to hire a janitor?
That comes up far less often than it should. I'm filthy stinking rich and nobody ever remembers that fact!
Ojama Yellow? (Yes boss?) Why am I wearing Ojama themed underwear?
D-damnit! I forgot I was wearing these! All the more reason to continue playing, so I get to take them off...
Hey! Who turned this into a Shadow Game? I blame you, ~player~!
I always knew you had access to shadow magic, ~player~!
Resorting to Shadow Games, ~player~? How despicable!
Hey, you look kinda familiar. Like some loser that I barely know.
~name~, where have I seen you before?
You remind me of a certain other loser I knew at Duel Academy.
That face of yours, ~name~, I feel like I've made it cry once before by whooping it's butt at Duel Monsters
A word of advice, Kazuma. Travelling to other dimensions is the worst thing that's ever happened to me.
G'day, Skullgar! Team Skull sounds like a bloody childish club name.
Bada-bing, bada-boom. Simple as that.
I activate my card's special ability. It forces you to remove an article of clothing, ~name~.
I'd rather have my XYZ Dragon Cannon blast your clothing off, but this is fine too.
This is the part where I ask you to take off something interesting.
You're a second rate duelist with a third rate deck.
News Flash, You've lost and you've gotta embarrass yourself for us.
What's wrong ~name~? Isn't this game supposed to be relaxing?
Make yourself useful and strip already, ~name~.
Well who could have predicted that?
Hey ~name~, don't keep The Chazz waiting... waiting to move past this, that is.
Hey, you look kinda familiar. Like some loser that I barely know.
~name~, where have I seen you before?
You remind me of a certain other loser I knew at Duel Academy.
That face of yours, ~name~, I feel like I've made it cry once before by whooping its butt at Duel Monsters
Oh noes. Look out everyone, we've got an edgelord here!
What's with the eyes? You possessed or something?
You know, I'm actually kinda glad none of my friends are here.
Some Duel Monsters cards tell a story, and there's one in particular that you remind me of. Allow me to regale you of it from the Duel Monsters Wiki page.
You an idol, Number One? Your confidence with that name is obnoxious, so I will punish you with the worst song I could find! Ahem...
Angels make you huddle up in fear? Well I've got good news, because I know about a lot more angels to give you a heart attack with!
Who's this lovely lady? Blonde, long hair, totally after my own heart.
Hey, ~name~, you look a lot like the cutest girl I know, Alexis Rhodes.
Alexis, is that you!? Oh wait, it's just ~name~. You still look great though, ~name~.
Oh, My beloved Alexis, here to play strip poker with me... Nevermind, it's just ~name~.
It's good to be the Chazz!
You know what the difference between you and me is? About a billion IQ points!
So, you're a cute girl, ~name~. The only thing cuter than you is watching you lose.
Seeing cute girls strip, what more could a man want?
Another step towards nudity, and ~name~ is the one making it!
I can't wait to see it all come off.
I learned to play poker from the love wizard himself, Atticus Rhodes! His teachings won't fail me!
What I wouldn't give to have you take it all off right now.
Yeah, more nudity! Don't try and take off a lame accessory name, or you'll get what's coming to you!
You won't beat me in 100 years, not that there's anything wrong with that.
Next time you won't get out so easily.
Getting a draw is just a fancy word for losing, anyhow.
The last time that happened, I wound up sacrificed by a demon in dreadlocks. All in all, a bad trip. I give it a 0/10 on TripAdvisor.
Blimey, that's a cowerdly manuver, ain't it, Skullgar? Not very ace of you, you cocky bloke.
Team Skull, huh? Sounds like a very childish bunch. Like you're pretending it's halloween every month of the year.
This is the part where I ask you not to strip off something dumb like your ~clothing~, and you do so anyway. So I'll just close my eyes and pretend to be oblivious.
Oh great, your ~clothing~, so original.
Lame.
You're gonna make this a two part episode at this rate.
Oh wow, you're gonna remove your ~clothing~, so original.
I've got places to be and people to beat in Duel Monsters, I don't have time for this!
This is the part where I ask you not to strip off something dumb like your ~clothing~, and you do so anyway. So I'll just close my eyes and pretend to be oblivious.
Now you're just trying to taunt me!
Lame. Very Very Lame!
What's next, you gonna introduce us to your extended family?
Oh wow, you're gonna remove your ~clothing~, so original.
I've got places to be and people to beat in Duel Monsters, I don't have time for this!
I could always have my Armed Dragon LV7 tear that off if you wanted.
I see no reason why you'd ever willingly go to another dimension... But maybe you just got luckier than me...
Okay, I'll stop now. Jim's backwards accent is too thick for me to grasp. Like cutting through the bread they serve in the Slifer Red dorm...
Well it's not Halloween! I don't gotta give you out any candy! (please disregard this line if it actually is halloween.)
Well would you look at that, you took off your ~clothing~. Just like I predicted.
I should have stayed in bed this morning...
I knew that was gonna happen. I read the script in advance.
And there you have it, the dweeb in his natural habitat.
Take off something bigger next time, you dork.
Wake me up when your penis is exposed...
Why do I even bother with these people?
I don't even know how to respond to that! Can we move on?
I'm just going to point out the hypocrisy in my complaining about you removing your small trinkets while also planning to remove my own.
Do you know this creep, Blast Magician? Do I need to Chazz him up?
Did you make a pact with a space monster as well? They gonna raise your dead kid? Cause The Chazz is gonna duel you right into the grave!
Do you want immortality too? Living forever isn't all it's cracked up to be. You're more likely to end up in a giant tube like Superintendent Kagemaru!
That sounds cool! I had to learn about a bunch of boring alchemy in my first term at Duel Academy.
I can see through the act, Revy. You were all sunshine and rainbows once, and then the underground dueling circuit gave you an edgy new look and an electro-stimulation fetish.
You must be like Zane, pretending to be edgy as part of your Pro League persona. There's no way you're actually a cigarette smoking, gun toting pirate.
What's with you Amalia? Wearing a bunch of leaves?
Oh look, it's one of Jaden's monster spirits. Elemental HERO Bug Brain!
You some kinda baker? What a lame profession. My older brother Jagger eats people like you for breakfast. Literally. He just bought a small baking company a few weeks back.
Since I don't believe you in the slightest, Lotte, I'm gonna issue a little test. I can see spirits too, and I've got one of my very own.
Why not remove the glasses while you're at it?
Is Yubel on the loose again? The last time she got out, she sent me across dimensions and then I got sacrificed by a demon in dreadlocks.
You said you were a Fairy type monster? Funny, because you seem more like a Fiend type to me.
There once lived a woman, who stole some old guy's stuff, and got exiled to the wastelands, where she later evolved into the Condemned Darklord.
High heels are so romantic.
Oh great, a HERO. HEROes bore me. So trite and predictable.
I dub thee Blast Magician, after a card which also claims to be the master of explosions and is total garbage.
If anything, I'm the real explosion master. Duel Monster holograms come with some pretty nice pyrotechnics. They're so powerful, they can send a duelist flying.
Does this spellcaster monster need some love?

I made myself a sandwich
My mommy named it Fred.
It tastes like beans and bacon
And smells like it's been dead.
Timelords are some of the biggest angels ever. They've all got creepy faces, and you can't destroy them via battle.
You ever meet Vylon Omega? He'll eats angels for breakfast. With his nonexistant robot mouth.
What's worse than an angel? A cyber angel! My beloved Alexis is the master of those cards. They'll make you scream!
Arcana Force monsters can manipulate luck, you know. So if they wanted you to get a bunch of awful hands in a row, there's nothing you could do about it.
Duel Monsters was invented by the pharaohs of Ancient Egypt, many years into the past.
Such a lovely girl, why is she removing something so trivial?
Just like unwrapping a tootsie roll pop to get to it's chocolatey center.
Oh Ms.~name~, take as long as you need.
Does The Chazz get you wet, ~name~?
I'm great at playing duelists like a fiddle. Even more so when I was a part of the Society of Light!
Oh, ~name~, it would be far more romantic if you took off everything at once.
Such a lovely girl, why is she removing something so trivial?
Just like unwrapping a tootsie roll pop to get to it's chocolatey center.
Oh Ms.~name~, take as long as you need.
Does The Chazz get you wet, ~name~?
Just like unwrapping a tootsie roll pop to get to it's chocolatey center.
Oh Ms.~name~, take as long as you need.
Does The Chazz get you wet, ~name~?
Do you like my underwear, ~name~? I know it's revolting and awful, but that's just my opinion.
Your ~clothing~ is a million times better than my underwear, no, a billion times, a trillion!
Quit staring at my underwear ~name~. The fact that you're removing your ~clothing~ isn't helping either.
You gonna embarass him by yourself? The less work for me, the more I get to look at your boobies!
Oh, you're doing it all for your girlfriend? I'm gonna Chazz you up regardless. And then I'll lose and Jaden will get to clean up my mess. That's just how these things go...
I'm kinda glad Banner got turned to dust and now lives inside of a cat. His classes were super lame.
Whoa, Hey! It was just a joke, no need to get your panties in a bunch.
I don't care about your bag, buy some Khakis or something!
I don't care what your real name is! You'll always be a Bug Brain to me. Just like those Slifer Slackers, who you just so happen to share a color scheme with. Coincidence?
He stuffed as many chemicals and artificial ingredients in their food as he could to reduce costs, because he's a capitalist pig who only cares about money and fame. Then again, so am I!
It's currently blowing a raspberry in your face, and since you aren't curling up in disgust, that just means I'm right.
Oh, you need them to read? I guess you can keep them then. But I'm so familiar with my Duel Monsters cards that I don't even need to read them anymore.
I'll beat the snot out of your evil and send you to the stars. And then you'll be so grateful that you want to sleep with me, I bet.
Oh, sorry. I'm not supposed to talk about religion, hence why Angels are referred to as Fairies. Looks like you're not supposed to talk about religion either.
I'm guessing you were exiled for different reasons though? Trying to sleep with an Archangel, am I right?
You know, Alexis has a pair just like those. Several actually. Atticus keeps buying them as gifts for her and she refuses to wear them. What a shame...
Stars are made of gas, and farts are also gas, so you're Elemental HERO Fartfire to me!
Or maybe you don't wanna blow up the joint, that's fine too.
And those are made of computers, not some phony magic.
Nevermind, looks like you've already got a fiend type monster equipped, forget I said anything.

Writing stuff is hard so I use a pointy pencil,
Pointy pointy pointy, pointy pointy point!
P.U., what's that horrible smell?!
I've got more coming. Plenty of angels to go around. Plenty of angels to torment you with.
Why do you fear angels anyway? What did an angel ever do to you?
Back then, the battles were fought for real, and losing meant you got sent to the Shadow Realm. (Which is where you usually end up anyway once the main villian duels.)
Shall I hold that for you, madam ~name~?
(I hope ~name~ likes the romantic schtick. It's gotta work one of these days.)
So romantic.
I complain about it, but that's only because it's what lovers are supposed to do.
Of course ~name~ loves me. Nobody can resist The Chazz.
I'm just going to point out the hypocrisy in my complaining about you removing your small trinkets while also planning to remove my own.
I'll bribe you to take off more. No? Then let's just continue like normal.
Am I making you wet?
If clothed female, naked male is your fetish, I can totally go along with that, ~name~.
The Chazz thinks that's a pretty pathetic move.
Do you show no compassion for my current state at all?
Aw man. Would it kill you to do a little more for me?
Come on! Quit playing around and get naked with me!
I'll send you to the stars if you don't pick something bigger next time! No seriously, the Princeton family owns a large stake in NASA.
And before that, I got sent to a giant desert, where I got mind controlled by a demon hand posesseing some french guy.
What's this, you actually like dimension hopping?
Say Skullgar, you wouldn't happen to know a man called Jim Crocodile Cook would you? Cowboy hat, eye bandages, carries a crocodile over his shoulder?
Where's your giant crocodile, Guzma? You do use monsters right, so how come you're not risking lower back pain by slinging them over your shoulder?
At least you don't have everyone gawking at your undies. You haven't even shown them yet.
I bet you've got plain undies, don't you, ~name~. You didn't have to special order these like I did...
At least people won't smirk at your underwear.
Just let me put on a laugh track when you show your undies, so you can experience what I'm feeling.
Boo hoo hoo, poor ~name~'s gotta remove their ~clothing~. Ha!
Your ~clothing~? A wimp like you would pick that, wouldn't they?
Don't cry, ~name~, it's just your ~clothing~.
Are you gonna strip or are you just gonna stand there pondering your purpose in life?
So in summary, never travel to alternate dimensions. Be perfectly content where you are, because where ever you'll end up is probably a billion times worse.
The only thing that could make a dimension better than my own would be a bunch of big titted blondes ready to make love at any moment.
He used a lot of spooky skull monsters as well. I even named you after one of his. His weakest one that is.
You store them in little balls instead? Cards are way more convenient. I can store a 40 card deck in the size of one pokeball!
Boo hoo hoo, poor ~name~'s gotta remove their ~clothing~. Ha!
At least the Shadow Riders knew when to quit. You clearly do not, ~name~.
Jaden always says that the game isn't over until the last card is drawn. I guess this game won't be over until the last item is stripped.
We'll see something more interesting next round. If not, I could always spice things up with my duel holograms.
Mwehehheh, you won't be able to slack off for much longer!
Why a harness anyway? We may have crazy hair at Duel Academy, but not crazy clothes.
You speak French, huh? You sound like Vice Chancellor Bonaparte.
Oh great, you can see Duel Monster spirits too. At least you don't have a stalk eyed mutant in a speedo.
What's this, you're not possessed? That's exactly what someone who'spossessedd would say!
Why the hell do you keep talking gibberish? You're a HERO, not someone babysitting a toddler.
Maybe it's that gray paint? Paint fumes are a serious health hazard, you know.
I'VE BEEN PLAYING WITH A ZOMBIE ALL ALONG?
You need special weapons to fight those angels, am I right? What if the weapons you use were angels themselves? Really think about that.
Screw angels, nordic gods are where it's at! Odin, Father of the Aesir counts as a fairy monster, so you're in deep trouble if ever you come across him!
You're interested in mythology? What a boring interest for such a sexy girl.
The greatest pharaoh of all, Atem, was sealed into the Millenium Puzzle, and sent far into the future.
It's okay, take your time, the Chazz will still be here when you are done there...
I'll buy the rest off of you. That's what the Princeton fortune is for.
Don't worry. The Chazz is really good at earning prizes like that.
Well, at least you aren't fat and balding, so you've got that going for you, Amalia.
But then again, your weak spirit can't perform an Ojama Delta Hurricane, now can it? That spell can destroy anything!
